articles.author: Samantha Chery, Michael Cavna
articles.title: WGA, AMPTP reach agreement to end writers strike - The Washington Post
articles.description: Thousands of Writers Guild of America members must ratify the contract union negotiators and studios agreed to in order to get TV and film writers working.
articles.content:
Comment on this story
Comment
Negotiators for Hollywood studios and the Writers Guild of America reached a breakthrough agreement after five straight days of negotiations a tentative deal to end a … [+5862 chars]

articles.author: Manoj Kumar
articles.title: Punjab's Sikhs fear Canada-India row threatens them at home, abroad - Reuters
articles.description: A bitter row between India and Canada over the murder of a Sikh separatist is being felt in Punjab, where some Sikhs fear both a backlash from India's Hindu-nationalist government and a threat to their prospects for a better life in North America.
articles.content: BHARSINGHPURA, India, Sept 25 (Reuters) - A bitter row between India and Canada over the murder of a Sikh separatist is being felt in Punjab, where some Sikhs fear both a backlash from India's Hindu-… [+4289 chars]
